definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: King of Sweden hands each winner a  diploma and a  medal.
sentences.chinese: 由瑞士国王亲手将证书和奖章授予获奖者。

sentences.english: No matter prize-winner nationality and sex.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者不论国籍和性别。

sentences.english: Winners of present-day TV game shows no longer get money from the shows.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者的电视娱乐节目，现在不再从节目得钱。

sentences.english: In addition, the awardees had the opportunity to share their stories with members of the American public.
sentences.chinese: 此外，获奖者有机会与美国公众分享她们的经历。

sentences.english: Selection of Distinguished Teachers is a two-stage process.
sentences.chinese: 挑选卓越教学奖获奖者的程序分为两步。

sentences.english: I am very grateful to be chosen to be the first recipient of the Oppenheimer Award.
sentences.chinese: 我很感谢委员会评选我为奥本海默奖的第一位获奖者。

sentences.english: Jiang Mei, the of the women's competition, said studying English her the prize.
sentences.chinese: 女子比赛的获奖者蒋梅说，是学习英语帮助她获了奖。

sentences.english: If awarded, the winners need to authorize the copyright to MIUI.
sentences.chinese: 一旦获奖，获奖者需要向MIUI进行版权授权。

sentences.english: The winners will be announced at the Awards Day at MCS at the end of the school year.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者将在学校的学年发奖大会上宣布。

sentences.english: Faith Lapidus tells about the awards and one of the winners.
sentences.chinese: 信仰拉皮迪告诉有关的奖项和获奖者之一。

sentences.english: All the winners for best acting were from outside the United States.
sentences.chinese: 最佳演员奖的所有获奖者均来自美国以外的地区。

sentences.english: Doing well is not enough; she has to be a prominent prizewinner.
sentences.chinese: 做的一般好都不行，必须是杰出的获奖者。

sentences.english: The authorities have used the carrot as well as the stick, upping the rewards paid to winners.
sentences.chinese: 当局软硬兼施，提高对获奖者的奖励。

sentences.english: One the the lifetime honorees for 2012 was George Stevens Jnr.
sentences.chinese: 2012年终身获奖者的得主是乔治斯蒂文斯。

sentences.english: Archives of the past winners and questioners.
sentences.chinese: 档案馆过去的获奖者和发问。

sentences.english: China thinks nothing of jailing a Nobel laureate and threatening trade sanctions against countries that attend the prize ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中国则会阻止其诺贝尔和平奖获奖者参加颁奖仪式。

definition: to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
